It was a well spent night with 40 young talents from different universities in 4 different countries. Thank you everyone who joined us in the Virtual Career Workshop last night.

We shared with them about the topics of Resume Writing, Cover Letter and LinkedIn during the 2 hours session. It was an interactive session where everyone were constantly asking questions. The session went slightly more than 2 hours.

This workshop was set to help all job seekers, fresh graduates and university students to prepare themselves before employment. Hope that they had gained valuable knowledge from the session.

It was the 12th Career Workshop from DR Resume Services and we had received 100% positive feedbacks from the participants. Thank you!

Due to overwhelming response from the participants, Sunday and Wednesday's session were both fully registered. DR Resume Services decided to organise a Final Session of Virtual Career Workshop to all job seekers.

Final Session of Career Workshop will held on:
Date: 16th May 2020 (Saturday)
Time: 3pm-5pm
Venue: Zoom

Registration URL: https://lnkd.in/gNeV7-z

Kindly register yourself earlier as there are limited of seats, this is the last session in May.

Hope to see you all!
